arts.ttl: Bayer Leverkusen vs PSG – Rai looks ahead to the match
arts.sum: This Tuesday, Paris Saint-Germain will be at the BayArena to face Bayer Leverkusen (kick-off at 9 p.m., CET) as part of Matchday 3 of the 2025-2026 Champions League. Rai, a former Brazilian international (49 caps) and PSG attacking player (1993-1998), was invited to share his thoughts on the match on the German team’s official website. […]

arts.ttl: Bayer Leverkusen vs PSG – German Team Preview: Offensive and Injuries

arts.ttl: Bayer Leverkusen vs PSG – Luis Enrique discusses Dembélé while tackling the media
arts.sum: Luis Enrique, head coach of first-place Paris Saint-Germain, held a press conference this Monday ahead of their 2025-2026 Champions League match against eighth-place Bayer Leverkusen at the BayArena tomorrow (kick-off at 9 p.m., CET). On the sidelines of the match, the Spaniard also spoke to Canal+. He discussed the return of Ousmane Dembélé, the 28-year-old […]

arts.ttl: PSG predicted XI v Bayer Leverkusen: Ousmane Dembélé back, but…
arts.sum: Having not played since the start of September, Ousmane Dembélé is set to make his long-awaited return when Paris Saint-Germain come up against Bayer Leverkusen in the UEFA Champions League…
